name: Burgas
fun_fact: Fun fact: Zlatna Kotva (Golden Anchor) restaurant has been serving seafood in Burgas since 1927 - nearly 100 years of Black Sea mussels, making it one of the oldest continuously operating restaurants in Bulgaria!

hero_dishes.name: Black Sea Mussels
hero_dishes.description: Fresh steamed mussels in aromatic white wine and garlic broth
hero_dishes.origin_story: Burgas's coastal location ensures incredibly fresh Black Sea seafood
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Ethno restaurant, Neptune restaurant near Sea Garden

hero_dishes.name: Shopska Salata
hero_dishes.description: Bulgaria's national dish - tomato, cucumber, onion, peppers topped with grated sirene cheese
hero_dishes.origin_story: Named after Shopi people of western Bulgaria, now a national symbol
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Every restaurant - it's the essential starter

hero_dishes.name: Tsatsa
hero_dishes.description: Typical local fried small fish from the Black Sea
hero_dishes.origin_story: Traditional coastal fishing catch prepared simply

hero_dishes.name: Kavarma
hero_dishes.description: Hearty pork stew with onions, peppers, tomatoes, paprika
hero_dishes.origin_story: Traditional Bulgarian comfort food from inland cuisine

signature_drinks.name: Rakia
signature_drinks.description: Grape or plum brandy - Bulgaria's national spirit
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Chilled as aperitif with shopska salata

signature_drinks.name: Ayran
signature_drinks.description: Cold yogurt drink with water and salt
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Refreshing accompaniment to meals, especially in summer

signature_drinks.name: Bulgarian Wine (Mavrud)
signature_drinks.description: Native red grape variety producing rich wines
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: With grilled meats and local cuisine

food_culture_notes: Bulgarian yogurt (kiselo mlyako) has unique bacterial strains found only here
Banitsa (filo pastry with cheese) is breakfast staple
Kebapche (grilled meat rolls) at every mehana
Ethno restaurant decorated in blue and white honoring Greek heritage of Burgas
